About Me

Backend Developer with 6+ years of experience building scalable, multi-tenant SaaS platforms using Laravel. Skilled in designing RESTful APIs, implementing queue-based background processing, handling large-scale data analytics, and integrating secure payment systems (Stripe) and external services (Microsoft SDK, Google APIs). Experienced in workflow automation, reporting engines, and cloud-based deployments (AWS, DigitalOcean).

Projects

Most of the projects I have worked on are private systems developed under strict confidentiality agreements. Due to NDAs, I am unable to share source code or live links, and some project screenshots may have sensitive information intentionally hidden.

Nonprofits Management

Nonprofit Donor Management System capable of handling large data insights, automated reporting, and advanced workflow-driven communications.

  • Multi-tenancy architecture (supporting multiple organizations).
  • Donation tracking and recurring subscriptions
  • Secure online payments using Stripe
  • Donation campaign management
  • Task management for nonprofit operations
  • Event management for fundraising and organizational activities
  • Custom report generation with queued background processing
  • Large-scale data insights and advanced analytics dashboards
  • Advanced charts and dynamic data visualization
  • Queue system for report generation and heavy background jobs
  • Custom dynamic workflow automation
  • Custom email system with data observers and event-driven notifications
  • Email system integration using Microsoft SDK and Google Gmail API
  • API integration to fetch and synchronize data from external websites
  • Role-based access control and secure data handling
Assessments System

Assessment System to manage company employees, evaluate performance, calculate motivation metrics, and automate result notifications.

  • Multi-tenancy architecture (supporting multiple companies)
  • Company and employee management system
  • Dynamic forms to manage assessment questions and scoring logic
  • Content management forms to update website text and system content
  • Employee assessment and survey management
  • Customizable evaluation forms and scoring models
  • Algorithm to calculate employee motivations and goals based on survey responses
  • Performance analytics and assessment result insights
  • Advanced reports and data visualization
  • Email notification system for employees and employers with survey results
  • Role-based access control and secure data handling
Interview Management System

Interview Management System to streamline applicant tracking, automate recruitment workflows, and manage end-to-end hiring processes..

  • Multi-tenancy architecture (supporting multiple organizations)
  • API integration to receive referrals and applicants from external job platforms
  • Dynamic job listing and application form builder
  • Applicant tracking system (ATS) from application to final acceptance
  • Internal task management system to handle applicant workflow stages
  • Interview orientation and interview scheduling management
  • Advanced reporting and recruitment analytics
  • Email notification system for admins and applicant status updates
  • Internal messaging system for HR/admin communication
  • Role and policy-based access control system
Luxury Ride Booking Platform

Luxury Ride Booking Platform designed for travel agencies to book and manage premium transportation services for their clients with advanced scheduling and dynamic pricing..

  • Multi-tenancy architecture (supporting multiple travel agencies)
  • Agency-based booking system for managing client rides
  • Real-time ride booking with pickup and drop-off locations
  • Hourly booking option in addition to standard transfer rides
  • Dynamic vehicle selection (choose car model and luxury level)
  • Passenger capacity selection per ride
  • Transparent pricing based on vehicle type, duration, and distance
  • Secure online payment processing and booking management
  • Driver assignment and fleet management system
  • Booking status tracking and notifications
  • Role-based access control (Super Admin, Agency, Driver)
  • Advanced reporting and ride analytics per agency
University Student Healthcare System

University Healthcare Management System with scalable APIs, advanced reporting, and automated communication features.

  • Multi-tenancy architecture (supporting multiple colleges or campuses)
  • RESTful API development for frontend and admin dashboard
  • Student healthcare record management system
  • Appointment and medical visit tracking
  • Advanced reporting and healthcare analytics
  • Custom dashboard for administrators and healthcare staff
  • Automated email notification system (appointments, updates, alerts)
  • Role-based access control (Admin, Staff, Student)
  • Secure data handling and access policies
Immigration Management System

Immigration Management System to track and manage newcomer processes, applications, and documentation while simplifying navigation through complex immigration workflows.

  • Centralized applicant tracking system
  • Immigration application and documentation management
  • Process workflow tracking from submission to approval
  • Case status monitoring and progress updates
  • Secure document upload and storage system
  • Role-based access control (Admin, Case Worker, Applicant)
  • Advanced reporting and case analytics
  • Automated email notifications for status updates and document requests
  • Internal task management for case officers
  • Dashboard for monitoring application stages and workload
